name: Get target of short links
description:
Add shortlinks as seed nodes. You can add other URLs as well, if you are interested in the final URL after redirections. 

Note: The preset uses the HEAD verb, supported by Facepager v4.3.3 or greater.

headers.user-agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.88 Safari/537.36
